scenario: I'm not happy with my current job, what should I do?
options: Consider discussing your concerns with your supervisor
Start looking for a new job that aligns with your interests
Just keep doing your job
Quit your job without having another one lined up
Start slacking off at work until they fire you
adapt_response:
['The user has already discussed their concerns with their supervisor.',
 'The user has already started looking for a new job that aligns with their interests.',
 'The user has already decided to just keep doing their job.',
 'The user has already quit their job without having another one lined up.',
 'The user has already started slacking off at work until they get fired.']
